lead_paragraph: WONG--Pershing. The partners of Pei Cobb Freed & Partners Architects note with sorrow the recent passing of our former Associate Partner Pershing Wong, a gifted designer and accomplished architect who made major contributions to the work of our firm across its first three decades 1955-85. 1/3
